item.description:
The key to long quality hikes in the fall and full skiing/riding days in the early winter season is simply to be in shape! So join us alongside the Charles River for our new fall ski fitness bootcamp workouts! We'll workout for about an hour and a half, keeping our heart rates up, strengthening our legs, core and upper bodies, and burning lots of calories! We'll do some good old fashion cardio drills, in between strength moves for our legs and core, which will give us an 'interval' like effect for maximum metabolic boost. We'll finish up doing a playground circuit with a bunch of stations to further work your core and lower body, as well get your upper body some strength training.

Chill time on the swings, post workout, totally optional! :)  The park is well lit so we can go past dusk. Bring layers as it gets chilly; water and bug spray are very good ideas as well!

The park is directly across the street from the Day's Hotel (1234 Soldiers Field Road) in Brighton. The closest bus route is the 86 but for an added work out you can always bike/walk along the Charles River Bike Path.

There is no $ charge for the workouts, we are just a group of skiers and rideres that want to get in shape for the season.

 

sample workout (this will progress and change as we get closer to ski season, each training wll be a little different)

 

High knees from point A to point B

But kicks from point B to point A

Squat kicks--alternate legs

Repeat

 

Walking planks x 15

Side plan each side

Supermans (lay on belly extend arms/legs for lower back)

Repeat

 

Walking lunges A to point B

Jog point B to point A

Repeat

 

Suicide sprints in parking lot

Two rounds

 

Plank twists x 20 each side

Step ups (on bench) 30 seconds each leg

Repeat

 

Skaters (jump side to side leg exercise)

Jog around track for break

Repeat

 

Scissor or bicycle abs--15 each side

Mountain climbers 30 second

Repeat

 

Water break/playground circuit instruction time

 

Playground Circuit x 3 (about 6 minutes per round with changes)

Station 1:  Burpees

Station 2:  Quick step ups

Station 3:  Pull ups

Station 4:  Jumping jacks

Station 5:  Push ups

Station 6:  Hanging knee ups

Station 7:  Step jumps (like bench jumps)

Water break/jog in place 60 seconds
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a small group in work out clothes near the Artesani Playground sign
item.name: Ski/Board Fitness - Bootcamp
